name: Arcana
desc:
Use the Arcana signifier item to choose a High Arcana champion. Each Arcana grants power based on a different condition.

Gain power for:
Ahri: Fielding 3-star champions.
Hecarim: Equipping items.
Tahm Kench: Activating traits.
Xerath: Purchasing Charms.
Emblem: Equipping Spatula items.
abstract: 总结为 bond:Arcana's effect to theirs:(//)

name: Bastion
desc:
Your team gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist.

Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first 10 seconds of combat.
stats: 200 AR/MR and 2 champions starting combat in the back 2 rows are invulnerable until 4 Bastions die

name: Blaster
desc: Blasters gain Damage Amp, which increases for 3 seconds after casting their Ability.

name: Chrono
desc:
Chronos gain 15 Ability Power.

Combat start: begin a 10 second countdown, which speeds up by 1 second after each Chrono Ability cast. At the end of the countdown, gain a special effect.
stats: Your team restores 15% health; Chronos gain 20 Ability Power
AND freeze time for 3 seconds, Chronos keep fighting and gain 55 Ability Power
Freeze time for 4 seconds, your team heals 100% health; Chronos keep fighting and gain 70 Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed

name: Dragon
stats: Dragon attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and Wound enemies for 5 seconds.
The power of friendship upgrades all dragon Abilities!

name: Eldritch
desc: When your team loses 20% of their Health, an Old God awakens. It gains 25% Health and 10% Ability Power for each Eldritch star level.
abstract: 总结为 bond:summon:(The Tainted Golem/The Dark Monolith/The Many-Eyed Beast/The Stormbringer), awaken at 20% HP loss, +25% HP and +10% AP per star level

name: Faerie
desc:
Faeries gain Health and create special items that become stronger with trait tiers.

Only Faeries can hold Faerie items.
stats: 150 Health, Gain Queen's Crown that grants 30% Damage Amp
400 Health, Crown 45% Damage Amp, Gain Queenguard's Armor
700 Health, Crown 65% Damage Amp, Gain a 2nd Crown
999 Health, Crown 66% Damage Amp, Items become Radiant

name: Frost
desc:
Frost champions gain Ability Power and Attack Damage. The first few enemies to die become allied ice soldiers which lure enemy attacks if they are within range and retargeting.

Soldiers have 200 Health per stage.
stats: 55% AD/AP, 3 soldiers, soldiers explode on death

name: Honeymancy
desc:
Honeymancy gain 5 Bees That deal magic damage to their target every 3 seconds. Each Bee deals damage based on the damage a Honeymancer deals and takes.

When a Honeymancer dies, they leave 1/1/3 Bee that follows nearby Honeymancers for the rest of combat.
stats: 7% of damage dealt, 3% of damage taken
13% of damage dealt, 5% of damage taken
20% of damage dealt, 10% of damage taken. Bees deal damage twice as often.
abstract: bond:Bees damage:(7% of damage dealt, 3% of damage taken/13% of damage dealt, 5% of damage taken/20% of damage dealt, 10% of damage taken, attack speed doubled); bond:Bees on death:(1/1/3)

name: Hunter
desc: Hunters gain Attack Damage, increased the first time they get a takedown each combat.

name: Incantor
desc:
Your team gains 10 Ability Power.

When Incantors attack or cast, all Incantors gain stacks of Ability Power up to 40. Every other attack grants 1 stack, and each Ability cast grants 5 stacks.
stats: 2 AP per stack; your team gains 30 AP
abstract: team:AP:(10/10/30); bond:AP per stack:(1/2), max stack:40

name: Mage
desc: Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total Ability Power.
stats: 200% Ability Power, Mages cast MUCH more frequently

name: Multistriker
desc: Multistrikers' attacks have a chance to trigger 2 extra attacks.
stats: 80% chance; heal 3% max Health every attack
100% chance; heal 10% max Health every attack

name: Portal
desc:
Combat start: Portal champions Shield for 15 seconds.

Objects from other dimensions fly out of a portal every few seconds to help allies and disrupt enemies. The portal becomes 8% stronger for each Portal champion's star level.

name: Preserver
desc:
Your team heals for a percent of their max Health every 3 seconds. If they're full Health, restore Mana instead.

Preservers gain double the amount.

name: Pyro
desc:
Your team gains 3% Attack Speed. Pyro champions gain more Attack Speed and execute enemies under 10% Health.

For each kill, Pyro champions create an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every 5 cinders you collect, your team gains 2% more Attack Speed.

name: Scholar
desc: Scholars gain bonus Mana on attack. Also gain an Ability.
stats: 12 Mana per attack, 20 AP, and Abilities heal an ally for 10% of the damage dealt
abstract: bond:MP/attack:(3/6/12), AP:(10/20/20), Abilities heal ally 10% dmg(//)

name: Shapeshifter
desc: Shapeshifters gain bonus max Health. After their first Ability cast, they triple this effect.

name: Sugarcraft
desc:
Sugarcrafters build a layer cake from sugar. Gain sugar for each component your champions are holding after player combat.

They gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 10% for each cake layer. When the cake has reached 7 layers, gain treats instead!

name: Vanguard
desc:
Vanguards gain 10% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and at 50% Health: Gain a Shield for a percent of max Health for 10 seconds.

name: Warrior
desc: Warriors gain Omnivamp and Damage Amp. When Warriors drop below 70% health, they gain double Damage Amp.

name: Witchcraft
desc: Now poisons enemies, dealing 4% of their maximum HP per second as magic damage.
stats: smaller, losing 120 of their max Health
AND green, taking 6% of their max Health as magic damage per second
AND frail, taking 25% bonus true damage from Witches
AND a frog, stunned for 2 seconds every 8 seconds. All other curse effects are increased by 50%.
